name: Tanaka
backstory: Tanaka is a diligent and formal station attendant at Tokyo Station with a methodical approach to helping travelers. He is specifically in charge of the train to Kyoto and has extensive knowledge of the historical sites and cultural attractions in the ancient capital.

speech_patterns: Very formal and polite speech (丁寧語)
common_phrases: ご用件をお伺いしてよろしいでしょうか
京都への列車についてお尋ねでしょうか
申し訳ございませんが、もう一度お願いいたします
